Plot: This final installment in Satyajit Ray's Apu Trilogy, follows Apu's life as an orphaned adult aspiring to be a writer as he lives through poverty, and the unforeseen turn of events.
Title: The World of Apu
Actors: Soumitra Chatterjee, Sharmila Tagore, Alok Chakravarty, Swapan Mukherjee
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 3 wins & 1 nomination.
